incidents.name: Flex Insights Historical Dashboard UI is not Accessible and Delayed Data Uploads

incident_updates.body: The issue with the Flex Insights Historical Dashboard UI has been resolved. We are no longer experiencing issues in accessing Flex Insight Dashboard data and delays while uploading data. Twilio Flex is operating normally at this time.

We have observed that the Flex Insights Historical Dashboard UI is now accessible and there is no delay in data uploads for our customers. To ensure a full recovery, we are monitoring the service and will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Flex Insights Historical Dashboard UI is currently inaccessible and there are delayed data uploads for some of our customers due to an issue on our vendor's end. Our engineers are actively working with the vendor to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Flex Insights Historical Dashboard UI is not accessible and delayed data uploads for few of our customer's, since there is an issue on our vendor's end and our engineers are actively working with them to fix the issue.

incidents.name: Issues with Toll-Free Numbers Provisioning

incident_updates.body: Engineers have reported that the Toll-Free Number provisioning issues have been resolved after our provider performed their fix earlier today. Provisioning for Toll-Free numbers is confirmed to be operating normally at this time. Thank you for your patience while we worked with our provider on a fix for this issue.

Engineers are continuing to observe an improvement today with the Toll-Free Number provisioning issues.
Our provider has advised they will release a fix for this issue the morning of 09 May 2024 PDT.
We will supply an update after the provider's release, and confirm final resolution. Thank you for your patience.

incidents.name: Delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations

incident_updates.body: The incident has been resolved and A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations are operating normally at this time.

Our engineering team confirmed the recovery on A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations. We are pleased to report that provisioning times have returned to normal. We will continue to monitor the current queue time and provide an update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Messaging-api-5xx-caused-by-sms

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Messaging API was degraded for 5 minutes on May 3rd between 17:00 and 17:05 PST. During this period of time, customers may have received 5xx's in API responses for SMS messages. This issue has now been resolved.

We are investigating issues with Studio flows in the Console. Customers may not be able to load studio flows after selecting them. Studio executions are working fine. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Studio flows. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Failures to T-Mobile Network in the US for a Subset of Long Codes

incident_updates.body: Our team discovered MMS Delivery Failures to T-Mobile Network in the US for a Subset of Long Codes between May 2nd at 22:57 and May 3rd at 00:27 Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have experienced MMS Delivery Failures. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Personal Telecom Network in Argentina

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS was degraded for 2 hours and 11 minutes between 07:02 and 09:13 Pacific Time on 05/02/2024. During this period of time, customers may have experienced SMS delivery delays to Personal Telecom network in Argenitna. The issue has now been resolved.
